article: May was born with a cleft palate . When she was a little girl, she had to  _  the jikes from naughty chidren who teased her about her misshaped lip. However, in Mary's case,  in addition to  her cleft palate, she was hardly able to hear out of one ear.  _  not to let the other children have another"  _  "to point out, she would  _  when her bad ear was tested each year. While words from a godly teacher can soften a heart, words form you can powerfully set the  _  of another One's life.
